mapper.select: SELECT GO_VACCINATION_RESULT_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_VACCINATION_NAME, GO_VACCINATION_DEGREE, GO_VACCINATION_RESULT_DEGREE, GO_VACCINATION_RESULT_REGISTRATION_DATE FROM go_vaccination_result JOIN go_vaccination ON go_vaccination_result.GO_VACCINATION_CODE = go_vaccination.GO_VACCINATION_CODE

SELECT GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_CODE as goCheckUpResultCode, GO_TREAT_CODE as goTreatCode, GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_FILE_PATH as goCheckUpResultFilePath, GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_FILE_NAME as goCheckUpResultFileName, GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_REGISTRATION_DATE as goCheckUpResultRegistrationDate, GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE as goCheckUpResultGoRegistrationDate FROM go_treat JOIN go_test_checkup_result on go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE=go_test_checkup_result.GO_TREAT_CODE JOIN go_citizen on go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_NO=go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_NO WHERE go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_ID=#{goCitizenId}
